casebody.data:
CITY OF ALAMOSA, COLORADO, petitioner,
v.
Joanna CHURCHILL, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Steven Wayne Bleck, Deceased. No. 13-1253. Supreme Court of the United States June 23, 2014.

Case below, 540 Fed.Appx. 866.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.
